news.title: Consumer prices rise 2.7% annually in July, less than expected amid tariff worries
news.summary: CPI was projected to increase 0.2% in July and 2.8% for a year ago on headline, and 0.3% and 3% on core.

news.title: Spirit Airlines warns it might not be able to survive without more cash
news.summary: Spirit AIrlines issued a going-concern warning in its quarterly report. Spirit AIrline is one of the world's largest independent oil and gas operators.

news.title: Circle shares rise as second-quarter revenue jumps 53% on strong stablecoin growth
news.summary: Circle shares jumped Tuesday after reporting its first quarterly earnings as a publicly listed company. Circle shares jumped 6.7% on Tuesday.

news.title: Musk threatens 'immediate' legal action against Apple over alleged antitrust violations
news.summary: ChatGPT was ranked No. 1 in the top free apps section of the American iOS store. Apple has tied up with OpenAI to integrate ChatGPT into its products.

news.title: Tesla is hiring robotaxi test drivers in New York City, but company hasn't applied for permits
news.summary: Tesla is recruiting test drivers for "automated driving systems" in Queens. Tesla hasn't applied for permits to test its autonomous vehicles on New York streets.

news.title: CPI manipulation isn’t an investor’s biggest concern. Watch this economic indicator instead.
news.summary: Inflation figures have come under suspicion. But manipulating the jobs data is much tougher to detect. Inflation figures are under suspicion, but manipulating jobs data much more difficult.

news.title: This SpaceX rival’s stock is skyrocketing as space’s ‘game of phones’ heats up
news.summary: Shares of AST SpaceMobile are soaring, as it has cemented its place as a rival to Elon Musk’s Starlink.

news.title: Key inflation rate shows biggest rise in 6 months, CPI shows, but Fed rate cut still appears in play
news.summary: Key measure of consumer prices in July posted the biggest increase in six months. Inflation is showing some upward pressure from tariffs but perhaps not enough to deter the Federal Reserve from cutting interest rates soon.

news.title: Why 6,500 can be a launching pad for the S&P 500, according to this trader
news.summary: In thin summer markets round numbers become magnets, says a popular newsletter author. In thin summer market round numbers are a magnet for investors, says the author.

news.title: Investors bid up for Bullish’s IPO as the CoinDesk parent gets set to go public
news.summary: Bullish is set to go public in the coming days, and is expected to be valued at up to $5 billion. Bullish will be listed on the New York Stock Exchange and the Nasdaq.
